name: Galeclaw

aura.name: galeclaw_rider
aura.description: While in team, can be summoned and used instead of a glider. Allows you to fire a gun while gliding with this Pal.

description:
A Pal that can easily take flight even while grasping a human.
 It is, however, prone to letting go when tired, which has led to the sudden demise of more than a few souls.

skills.name: gale_claw
skills.description: Galeclaw's exclusive skill. Soars through the air with its talons outstretched forward.

skills.name: air_cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: sand_blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: wind_cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: sand_tornado
skills.description: Generates two sand tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: grass_tornado
skills.description: Generates two tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: pal_blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
